column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////THE PLACE: I went to two locations in the Chicago loop area. Both locations were clean and have a very cozy
column2: welcoming environment. At one of the restaurants
column3: we sat in and our waiter was so helpful and sweet. At the other location
column4: we went only for pick up and our pizza's were ready at the estimated time with no problems at all. Â
